name: William Searles
coverLetter: I trim my own and have helped trim over the years.  I'm currently enrolled in  the Cannabis Training University to get all my certifications that i can get. I have also completed an passed my OLCC test and completed the application for handlers card. #7930362  my hours of availability is Monday - Friday 5PM - 3PM. I'm also available for some evenings an weekeds. I am single dad of 4 kiddos so my schedule is very very hectic. I'm looking for someone that is willing to work with my hectic schedule because my kids come first an mean the world to me so i love my time that i do get with them.
